alert.note: Alert for Palm Beach (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 24 at 3:31PM EDT until June 24 at 4:00PM EDT by NWS Miami
info.description: The National Weather Service in Miami has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... North central Palm Beach County in southeastern Florida... * Until 400 PM EDT. * At 331 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 9 miles west of North County Airport, or 11 miles southeast of Indiantown, moving south at 20 mph. Some rotation was detected with this storm. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... The Acreage. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
